Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi Avar:

2 manupuththirane, Nee Kalagaveettaarin Naduvile Thangiyirukkiraai; Kaanumpadikku Avargalukkuk Kangal Irundhaalum Kaanaamarpogiraargal; Ketkumpadikku Avargalukkuk Kaadhugal Irundhaalum Kelaamarpogiraargal; Avargal Kalagaveettaar.

3 ippodhum Manupuththirane, Nee Paradhesam Pogumpadi Prayaana Saamaangalai Aayaththappaduththi, Pagarkaalaththile Avargal Munbaagap Prayaanappadu; Un Sthalaththaivittu Vere Sthalaththukku Avargaludaiya Kangalukku Munbaagap Purappattuppo; Avargal Kalagaveettaaraanapodhilum Oruvelai Sindhiththu Unaruvaargal.
4 avargaludaiya Kangalukku Munbaaga Nee Suvarile Dhuvaaramittu, Adhin Vazhiyaai Avaigalai Veliye Kondupovaayaaga.

5 siraiyiruppukkup Pogiravanaippol Un Saamaangalai Nee Pagarkaalaththile Avargal Kangalukku Munbaaga Veliye Vaiththu, Nee Saayankaalaththile Avargal Kangalukku Munbaaga Siraiyiruppukkup Pogiravanaippola Purappaduvaayaaga.

6 avargaludaiya Kangalukku Munbaaga Avaigalai Un Tholinmel Eduththu, Maalaimayangum Velaiyile Veliye Kondupovaayaaga; Nee Dhesaththaip Paaraadhapadi Un Mugaththai Moodikkol; Isravel Vamsaththaarukku Unnai Adaiyaalamaakkinen Endraar.

7 enakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye Naan Seydhen; Siraippattuppogumpodhu Saamaangalaik Kondupovadhupola En Saamaangalaip Pagarkaalaththil Veliye Vaiththen; Saayankaalaththilo Kaiyinaal Suvarile Dhuvaaramittu, Maalai Mayangum Velaiyile Avaigalai Veliye Kondupoi, Avargal Kangalukku Munbaaga Avaigalaith Tholinmel Eduththukkonduponen.
8 vidiyarkaalaththile Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
9 manupuththirane, Kalagaveettaaraagiya Isravel Vamsaththaar Unnai Paarththu: Nee Seygiradhu Ennavendru Unnaik Kettaargal Allavaa?
10 idhu Erusalemil Irukkira Adhipadhiyinmelum Adhin Naduvil Irukkira Isravel Vamsaththaar Anaivarinmelum Sumarum Baaram Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Avargalidaththil Sollu.
11 nee Avargalai Nokki: Naan Ungalukku Adaiyaalamaayirukkiren; Naan Seyvadhu Eppadiyo, Appadiye Avargalukkum Seyyappadum; Siraippattup Paradhesam Povaargal.

12 avargal Naduvil Irukkira Adhipadhi Maalaimayangumpodhu Tholinmel Sumaisumandhu Purappaduvaan; Veliye Sumaikondupoga Suvarile Dhuvaaramiduvaargal; Kanninaale Avan Than Dhesaththaik Kaanaadhapadi Than Mugaththai Moodikkolvaan.
13 naan En Valaiyai Avanmel Veesuven, Avan En Kanniyile Pidipaduvaan; Avanaik Kaldheyar Dhesamaagiya Baabilonukkuk Kondupoven; Ange Avan Saavaan; Aagilum Adhaik Kaanamaattaan.
14 avanukku Udhaviyaaga Avanai Sutrilum Irukkira Yaavaraiyum Avanudaiya Ellaa Raanuvangalaiyum Naan Sagala Thisaigalilum Thootri, Avargal Pinne Pattayaththai Uruvuven.
15 appadi Naan Avargalai Jaadhigalukkulle Thootri, Avargalai Dhesangalile Sidharadikkumpodhu, Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal.

16 aanaalum Thaangal Poichcherum Jaadhigalukkulle Thangal Aruvaruppugalaiyellaam Vivarikkumpadi, Naan Avargalil Konjamperaip Panjaththukkum Pattayaththukkum Kollainoikkum Thappi Meendhirukkappannuven; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal Endru Sol Endraar.
17 pinnum Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
18 manupuththirane, Nee Un Appaththai Nadukkaththode Pusiththu, Un Thanneeraith Thaththalippodum Visaaraththodum Kudiththu,

19 dhesaththilulla Janangalai Nokki: Isravel Dhesaththilulla Erusalemin Kudigalaikkuriththuk Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Thangal Appaththai Visaaraththode Pusiththu, Thangal Thanneeraith Thigilode Kudippaargal; Avargaludaiya Dhesaththuk Kudigaludaiya Kodumaigalinimiththam Adhilulladhellaam Azhiya, Adhu Paazhaagum.
20 kudiyeriyirukkira Pattanangal Vanaandharangalaagi, Dhesam Paazhaaippogum; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolveergal Endru Sol Endraar.
21 pinnum Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
22 manupuththirane, Naatkal Needikkum, Dharisanam Ellaam Avamaagum Endru Isravel Dhesaththile Vazhangum Pazhamozhi Enna?

23 aagaiyaal Nee Avargalai Nokki: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Avargal Ini Isravelile Indhap Pazhamozhiyai Sollivaraadhapadikku Naan Adhai Ozhiyap Pannuven; Naatkalum Ellaa Dharisanaththin Porulum Sameebiththu Vandhana Endru Avargalode Sollu.
24 isravel Vamsaththaarin Naduvil Ini Sagala Kallaththarisanamum Mugasthudhiyaana Kurisolludhalum Iraamarpogum.

25 naan Karththar, Naan Solluven, Naan Sollum Vaarththai Niraiverum; Inith Thaamadhiyaadhu; Kalagaveettaare, Ungal Naatkalile Naan Vaarththaiyai Solluven, Adhai Niraiveravum Pannuven Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
26 pinnum Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
27 manupuththirane, Idho, Isravel Vamsaththaar: Ivan Kaangira Dharisanam Niraivera Aneganaal Sellum; Dhooramaayirukkira Kaalangalaikkuriththu Ivan Theerkkadharisanam Sollugiraan Engiraargal.

28 aagaiyaal En Vaarththaigalil Ondraagilum Inith Thaamadhippadhillaiyendru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar; Naan Sonna Vaarththai Niraiverum Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Avargalode Sol Endraar.
